caption: Metric
description: The Metric object defines a simple name/value pair entity for a metric.
name: metric

uid.description: The unique identifier of the metric being reported, used to maintain the state of the reporting system for cumulative or delta metrics.

metric_type.description: The metric type, as defined by the metric_type_id.

metric_type_id.description: Metric type represent specific type of metric asociated with a metric value.
